value.title: Incremental Refresh with Integers in Power BI
value.excerpt: How do you use integer date keys with Incremental Refresh in Power BI??? Patrick walks you through how to do it.  Documentation: https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/admin/service-premium-incremental-refresh  Download Sample: https://guyinacu.be/increfreshsample  📢 Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership

value.title: Inside Power Query reference queries for Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: Chris Webb joins Patrick to look at what happens when you use reference queries for Power Query. This applies to both Power BI and Excel. Chris also looks at how change the behavior to make things a bit faster.  Data Privacy Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2018/12/27/data-privacy-settings-data-refresh-performance-power-bi-excel/

value.title: Install and configure Power BI Report Server (May 2017 Preview)
value.excerpt: In this video, I look at how to install and configure the May 2017 Preview of Power BI Report Server. Power BI Report Server has a new standalone install experience and this product allows for Power BI reports to be rendered in the web portal along with paginated reports.
